snippet: Norway made another contribution to the Atlantic Council — about $115,000 in 2007 — -to fund a program that would prepare advice for United States officials and other global leaders on how to create more peaceful relations between Turkey and the...
lead_paragraph: Norway made another contribution to the Atlantic Council — about $115,000 in 2007 — -to fund a program that would prepare advice for United States officials and other global leaders on how to create more peaceful relations between Turkey and the Kurds, who for much of the last decade have controlled the northern part of Iraq.
